con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="SifAcquittal_V3" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/SifAcquittal/V3" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/SifAcquittal/V3" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:hlp="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/Helper/V3"> <wsdl:documentation>Baseline: 0.8.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:import location="http://ENVIRONNEMENT/Nasca-Fuzion/services/SifAcquittal?wsdl=../Helper_V3.wsdl" namespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/Helper/V3"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/SifAcquittal/V3" version="1.0" xmlns:meta="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/MetaInfo/V6" xmlns:acquittal="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/SifAcquittal/V2"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/MetaInfo/V6" schemaLocation="http://ENVIRONNEMENT/Nasca-Fuzion/services/SifAcquittal?xsd=schema/MetaInfo/MetaInfo_V6.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/SifAcquittal/V2" schemaLocation="http://ENVIRONNEMENT/Nasca-Fuzion/services/SifAcquittal?xsd=../schema/Acquittal/SifAcquittal_V2.xsd"/> <xs:element name="AcquittalAcknowledge"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ApplHeader" type="meta:ApplHeaderStruct"/> <xs:element name="AcquittalAcknowledgeDetails" type="acquittal:AcquittalAcknowledgeStruct"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AcquittalAcknowledgeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ApplHeader" type="meta:ApplHeaderStruct"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AcquittalDecision"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ApplHeader" type="meta:ApplHeaderStruct"/> <xs:element name="AcquittalDecisionDetails" type="acquittal:AcquittalDecisionStruct"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AcquittalDecisionResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ApplHeader" type="meta:ApplHeaderStruct"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="acquittalDecisionResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AcquittalDecisionResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="acquittalDecision"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AcquittalDecision" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="acquittalAcknowledge"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AcquittalAcknowledge" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="acquittalAcknowledgeResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AcquittalAcknowledgeResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SifAcquittal"> <wsdl:operation name="acquittalAcknowledge"> <wsdl:input message="tns:acquittalAcknowledge"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:acquittalAcknowledgeResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:AuthorizationFault" name="AuthorizationFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:ValidationFault" name="ValidationFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:SystemFault" name="SystemFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:AuthenticationFault" name="AuthenticationFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="acquittalDecision"> <wsdl:input message="tns:acquittalDecision"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:acquittalDecisionResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:AuthorizationFault" name="AuthorizationFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:ValidationFault" name="ValidationFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:SystemFault" name="SystemFault"></wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault message="hlp:AuthenticationFault" name="AuthenticationFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SifAcquittalSOAPbinding" type="tns:SifAcquittal"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="acquittalAcknowledge"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/SifAcquittal/V3/SifAcquittal/acquittalAcknowledge"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="AuthorizationFault"> <soap:fault name="AuthorizationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="ValidationFault"> <soap:fault name="ValidationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="SystemFault"> <soap:fault name="SystemFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="AuthenticationFault"> <soap:fault name="AuthenticationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="acquittalDecision"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/SifAcquittal/V3/SifAcquittal/acquittalDecision"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="AuthorizationFault"> <soap:fault name="AuthorizationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="ValidationFault"> <soap:fault name="ValidationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="SystemFault"> <soap:fault name="SystemFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> <wsdl:fault name="AuthenticationFault"> <soap:fault name="AuthenticationFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SifAcquittalService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:SifAcquittalSOAPbinding" name="SifAcquittal"> <soap:address location="http://ENVIRONNEMENT/Nasca-Fuzion/services/SifAcquittal"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="Helper_V3" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/Helper/V3" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/Helper/V3" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:meta="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/MetaInfo/V6"> <wsdl:documentation>Baseline: 1.5.0</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/Helper/V3" version="1.0"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/MetaInfo/V6" schemaLocation="http://ENVIRONNEMENT/Nasca-Fuzion/services/SifAcquittal?xsd=schema/MetaInfo/MetaInfo_V6.xsd"/> <xs:element name="AuthenticationFault" type="meta:AuthenticationFaultStruct"/> <xs:element name="AuthorizationFault" type="meta:AuthorizationFaultStruct"/> <xs:element name="SystemFault" type="meta:SystemFaultStruct"/> <xs:element name="ValidationFault" type="meta:ValidationFaultStruct"/> <xs:element name="FluxSyncFault" type="meta:FluxSyncFaultStruct"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="FluxSyncFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:FluxSyncFault" name="detail"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AuthorizationFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AuthorizationFault" name="detail"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SystemFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:SystemFault" name="detail"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ValidationFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:ValidationFault" name="detail"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AuthenticationFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:AuthenticationFault" name="detail"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/MetaInfo/V6" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/MetaInfo/V6"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Baseline: 1.5.0</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="ErrorBaseStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Base type for representing fault information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Timestamp" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Timestamp when the error occurred.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AuthenticationFaultStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Signals that the sending application is denied access to the target system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ErrorBaseStruct"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="MessageID" type="UniqueId15Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Identification of the message (operation) that caused the error.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AuthorizationFaultStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Signals insufficient permission to access information or perform an operation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ErrorBaseStruct"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="MessageID" type="UniqueId15Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Identification of the message (operation) that caused the error. For NISSE, this information is only available when the error is reported by a LOB application.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ValidationFaultStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Signals XML Schema Definition (XSD) validation of the request was not succesful. Each distinct validation error results in a Detail element containing a description of the issue.
The sending application MUST be corrected before the operation is executed again.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ErrorBaseStruct"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="Detail" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Detailed information on a validation error.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FluxSyncFaultStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Signals that an operation is not valid for the current state of the flux.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ErrorBaseStruct"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MessageID" type="UniqueId15Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Identification of the message (operation) that caused the error.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SystemFaultStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Notifies the sending application that the message with the specified MessageID could not be processed.
The sending application MUST resend the message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="ErrorBaseStruct"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="MessageID" type="UniqueId15Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Identification of the message (operation) that caused the error. For NISSE, this information is only available when the error occurs after the validation phase.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="BlockStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides information on a given chunck within a bulk operation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SequenceID" type="UniqueId36Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Unique identification of a bulk sequence.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Sequence number of the block, one based.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:integer"/> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="IsLast" type="xs:boolean" use="optional"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether the current block is the last block of the bulk operation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ApplHeaderStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Meta-data of the message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MessageID" type="UniqueId15Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Unique identification of the message exchange. For POW or RR, the receiving node MUST echo the MessageID of the request in the response.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Timestamp" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Timestamp when the message is generated in the L.O.B. application (for RR requests and responses, and POW requests) or the B2B system (for POW responses).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="UserID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Identification of the end-user. This information MUST be provided in the request when a web service is used interactively. For automated requests (and responses) this element MUST be omitted.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FluxDescriptorStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Wordt gebruikt voor correlatie met een flux van berichten. Dient gegenereerd te worden door de eerste afzender, dit is de initiator van de flux, en vervolgens gekopieerd door alle deelnemers aan de flux.</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Il est utilisé pour corréler avec un flux de messages. Doit etre générer par le premier expéditeur, ceci c' est le initiator du flux, et ensuite copié par tous participants au flux.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Initiator" type="OrganizationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Organization that started the flux.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FluxID" type="UniqueId36Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Unique identification (within initiator) of a flux instance.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="FluxDefinition"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Name" type="UniqueId36Type"/> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="UniqueId15Type"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]{1,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UniqueId36Type"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9_.]{1,36}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OrganizationType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en-us">Identifies an organization within the primary or sector network of the Social Security. In case of NISSE, the value of this element MUST be "000". A SIF is identified by its SIF code (eg. "010" for Acerta).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9]{3,3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/SifAcquittal/V2" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:personbase="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/PersonBase/V1" xmlns="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/SifAcquittal/V2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Baseline: 0.8.0</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/PersonBase/V1" schemaLocation="http://ENVIRONNEMENT/Nasca-Fuzion/services/SifAcquittal?xsd=../../schema/PersonBase/PersonBase_V1.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="AcquittalAcknowledgeStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Registratiebevestiging van de aanvraag kwijtschelding</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Confirmation d'inscription de la demande de renonciation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="SIFCode"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="INSS"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="RequestDate"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="RequestType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="Acknowledged"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="NotAcknowledgedCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="SIFCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Fondsnummer</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Code de la caisse</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="INSS" type="personbase:INSSType"/> <xs:element name="RequestDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Type aanvraag</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Type de demande</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Acknowledged"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Registratiebevestigings</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Confirmation d'inscription</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="NotAcknowledgedCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Code die een negatieve registratiebevestiging motiveert</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Code qui motive une confirmation d'inscription négative</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="AcquittalDecisionStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Beslissing van de aanvraag kwijtschelding</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Décision de la demande de renonciation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="SIFCode"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="INSS"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="RequestDate"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="RequestType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="DecisionCode"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="MotivationCode"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" ref="QuarterDecisions"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="QuarterDecisions" type="QuarterDecisionsStruct"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Kwartaal details</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Détails trimestre</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="QuarterDecisionsStruct"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="Quarter"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" ref="ContributionType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" ref="Amount"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Quarter"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Datatype voor kwartaal</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Format trimestre</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="5"/> <xs:pattern value="[1-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][1-4]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ContributionType" type="ContributionType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Aard bijdrage</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Type de cotisation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="ContributionType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PROVISIONAL"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">voorlopig</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">provisoire</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DEFINITIVE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">definitief</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">définitive</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="REGULARIZED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">geregulariseerd</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">régularisée</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="DecisionCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Beslissingscode</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Code de la décision</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MotivationCode"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Motivatiecode</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Code de la motivation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Amount"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Goedgekeurd bedrag</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Montant approuvé</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/PersonBase/V1" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.rsvz-inasti.fgov.be/schemas/WS/schema/PersonBase/V1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Baseline: 1.5.0</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType name="INSSType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Type voor INSZ nummer. Unieke identificatiesleutel per natuurlijk persoon die gebruikt wordt in de gehele sociale zekerheid. Voor de personen opgenomen in het Rijksregister is dit het rijksregisternummer; voor de andere personen is dit het KSZ-nummer(bisnummer). Formaat: Maximaal 11 karakters. JJMMDDxxxYY : jaar maand dag xxx volgnr YY modulus 97.</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Le type de numéro NISS. La clé d'identification unique par personne physique qui est utilisée dans le secteur de la sécurité sociale. Pour les personnes inscrites au Registre national, c’est le numéro de Registre national ; pour les autres personnes, c’est le numéro BCSS (numéro bis). Format: 11 caractères maximum. AAMMJJxxxYY : année mois jour xxx numéro d'ordre YY modulos 97</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([0][0-9])|([1][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="FR">Registre National</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="NL">Rijksregister</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:pattern> <xs:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([2][0-9])|([3][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="FR">Registre Bis : numéro Bis</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="NL">Bis register : Bisnummer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:pattern> <xs:pattern value="[0-9][0-9](([4][0-9])|([5][0-2]))(([0-2][0-9])|([3][0-1]))[0-9]{3}(([0-8][0-9])|([9][0-7]))"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="FR">Registre Bis : numéro TER</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="NL">Bisregister : Ternummer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:pattern> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="GenderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Geslacht</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Sexe</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Male"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Man</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Masculin</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Female"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="nl">Vrouw</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="fr">Féminin</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"/>
